attributes.action: PARENTS AGAINST THE EXTORTIONATE COST OF HIGH SCHOOL UNIFORMS
attributes.additional_details: To look into the outrages costs it is to get the items of clothing ect your child needs to start high school... let alone if you have more than 1 child , average cost 150 pounds each ... id like the government to look into why it cost soooo much more when they do go to high school , were as in the lower school all the high street shops are fighting to sell it to you cheaper... but as they go up to the high school you are given a long list of items they have to have and other than the shirts trousers or skirts the rest you have to buy at really high cost to the parent by the time you have finished buying it all
